§ 31301. Healthcare program The Administrator shall develop a plan to better understand the longitudinal health effects of space flight on humans. In the development of the plan, the Administrator shall consider the need for the establishment of a lifetime healthcare program for Administration astronauts and their families or other methods to obtain needed health data from astronauts and retired astronauts. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3376.)
